company.business_diffrences: You can get a massage and then feel the same a few hours later, or you can get actual therapeutic bodywork and feel like a million bucks.
company.learning_trade: Cleveland Chiropractic College Massage Therapy program.

company.name: Jessica Jaffe CMT
company.description: A massage therapist for 5 years, with over 1000 trained hours in swedish, deep tissue, and sports massage. 1000 hours spa experience, additionally trained in prenatal, pediatric, trigger point and myofascial release techniques. Certified kinesiotaping practicioner, extensive knowledge of anatomy and physiology.

company.business_diffrences: Bringing professional massage services at affordable prices so that you can make it a part of your health and well being, not just a luxury.
company.why_love: Our passion is to give, heal, and nurture every client that walks through our doors through the power of massage. Our goal is to bring you back to your center and improve your quality of living. We are dedicated to providing the best possible service and a blissful experience and love the feeling of happiness that our profession is able to provide to our clients.
company.name: Temple Massage Therapy
company.description: Temple Massage Therapy was created to provide you with talented, high quality massage professionals who take their craft to heart. Each therapist is an independent contractor that brings their own unique talents and touch to massage therapy. We empower our massage therapist so they can focus on what matters most, you! In the mist of all the chaos that happens, we slow things down and bring relief from the stresses of your daily life.

company.business_diffrences: I have a long history with the movement and manipulation of my own body. Through stretching techniques, dance, and competitive gymnastics, I have developed an innate sense of what a specific body needs to alleviate pain.
company.learning_trade: Meet Jareb L: I graduated from Mueller College of Holistic Studies in San Diego in 2010. After completing 1000 hrs of classroom and hands-on training, I earned a certificate as a Holistic Health Practitioner.  In late 2010, I decided to move to Los Angeles to work in the spa industry and  build a private practice.
company.why_love: I love helping people live a life that is free from nagging aches and pains.
company.name: Jareb Liewer Drift Massage
company.description:
I specialize in Eastern and Western relaxation and deep tissue/structural massage. I help relieve tension and help clients manage chronic pain. I provide a calming and healing atmosphere whether I come to you or you come to me.

I have been working in the spa industry for the past three years while maintaining a private client base as well. I decided to push farther with private practice and develop my business this past year and it feels amazing! I have so much gratitude for the positive responses I get from clients, and how well my practice is growing and changing.

I live in a creative live-work space in the Arts District of downtown LA, and share the loft with my circus performer friends. I have an extensive history in performance, physical, vocal, and visual arts, and exercise these talents regularly along with my massage practice.  

My experience in gymnastics and power tumbling helps me to understand the bodies and stresses of very active people.

I am originally from Nebraska and go back home to see my family at least once every year during the holidays.  They are all excited that I'm a massage therapist -- it's a gift I don't have to wrap for them!

company.why_love: EssentialBlu is founded on the simple principle that water is essential to life. Water is a primary source of hydration and a must for health and beauty…inside and out. Our specialty is cleansing with colon hydrotherapy. While colon hydrotherapy is an amazingly effective process, it is also a team effort. Even with good water and a great therapist, you have a vital part in the process. Your part is to relax.  We create soothing surroundings intended for deep relaxation, which gives way to more thorough elimination.  With soft music in a comfortable, calm, clean environment, your mind will ease into a state of peace and your senses into a state of serenity.
company.name: Essential Blu Wellness
company.description:
The Essential Blu team is dedicated to empowering you to achieve your personal wellness goals by sharing relevant information and assisting you in achieving balance-mind, body and spirit.  All of our therapists are highly educated, trained, certified and experienced in their fields of practice. We provide our services in a safe, nurturing environment for your comfort.

Our specialty is cleansing with colon hydrotherapy. While colon hydrotherapy is an amazingly effective process, it is also a team effort. Even with good water and a great therapist, you have a vital part in the process. Your part is to relax.  We create soothing surroundings intended for deep relaxation, which gives way to more thorough elimination.  With soft music in a comfortable, calm, clean environment, your mind will ease into a state of peace and your senses into a state of serenity.

company.name: Echo Foot Lounge
company.description:
﻿The philosophy behind Echo Foot Lounge is to be hip and holistic, stylish yet affordable, bringing the old eastern tradition of reflexology with a new age vibe. Echo Foot Lounge was designed to uniquely encompass modern luxury touches without the spa prices. Balanced with soothing natural elements, our licensed massage healers will knead away fatigue and stress.

Located near the well known Sunset Junction, Echo Foot Lounge is the true reflection of the ideal Echo Park / Silverlake experience. At this urban retreat, guests experience a revitalizing foot, head, neck and shoulders massage enhanced through natural organic herbs and essential oils.

company.business_diffrences: In addition to personalized service, Spa Connections can provide a total spa experience, complete with ambiance music, candles, robes, comfortable linens, prestige products and complimentary treats with gift packages. We work with each client to come up with the perfect package for any occasion.
company.why_love: Bringing Luxury Spa Experiences to You.
company.name: Spa Connections Mobile Spa
company.description:
Spa Connections brings to you on-demand, on-site luxury spa experiences. The company was founded by a former concierge, who wanted to offer easy access to private, luxury beauty and wellness services. Originally dedicated to serving LA’s top hotels, Spa Connections has evolved to become the go-to spa service for celebrities, professional athletes, customized special and corporate events, weddings, spa parties, bridal showers and film and editorial styling.

Spa Connections features a team of nationally recognized beauty & wellness specialists, who are among the best in the industry and are accustomed to serving an A-list clientele. Additionally, every specialist employed by Spa Connections goes through a thorough interview process, service test and training and are custom-matched according to each client’s needs and specifications.

Services include: on-site massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, makeup/hair, yoga/pilates, personal training, body wraps/scrubs, waxing/threading, spray tanning, hair extensions, eyelash extensions, fashion styling, personal shopping, among others.

name: Edward Pan DC Chiropractic Care Center

company.business_diffrences: By combining the very best hands-on technique, state-of-the-art physiotherapy procedures, and providing the newest and best natural vitamins and mineral supplements on the market today, Dr. Pan is able to help you to accelerate and/or maintain your journey to good health.
company.learning_trade: Dr. Edward Pan received his Bachelor of Science in biology from George Washington University and his Doctorate of Chiropractic from Cleveland Chiropractic College in Los Angeles.
company.why_love: Patients seeking treatment at Chiropractic Care Center with Dr. Edward Pan are assured of receiving only the finest quality care through the use of modern chiropractic equipment and technology. Dr. Edward Pan and the staff have a genuine concern for your well-being!
company.name: Edward Pan DC Chiropractic Care Center
company.description: Dr. Edward Pan, DC, is listed as one of America's Top Chiropractors in 2009 by the Consumer Research Council of America. Located in the heart of downtown Los Angeles and in Van Nuys, the leading health professionals at Chiropractic Care Center are dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives by combining skills and expertise that span the entire chiropractic wellness spectrum. Dr. Edward Pan is a chiropractor who is committed to bringing you better health and a better way of life by teaching and practicing the true principles of chiropractic wellness care.

company.business_diffrences: I come to you so that you can enjoy your massage wherever you're the most comfortable and will be able to relax the most.
company.learning_trade: All therapists are well trained, licensed and extremely skilled and caring in their specialties.
company.why_love: I like taking care of people. Taking care of their physical aches is how I know to do this. I also enjoy the friends I have made along the way in this profession.
company.name: Spa2U
company.description: Spa2U is a unique experience that delivers the ancient art of Thai massage to the comfort and privacy of your own living room, office, or even the beach.  This means that you won't have to fight horrific LA traffic in order to get to and from your massage, no sitting in boring waiting rooms or listening to music that you don't like.  Best of all, your massage will be performed wherever you will feel most relaxed. Thai massage is an ancient and sacred system of healing with roots in yoga, ayurvedic medicine and Thai Buddhist spiritual practice. It is a system which combines assisted yoga therapy, rhythmic massage, acupressure, gentle twisting, and energy work.  This work aids in releasing stress and tension, increases vitality and well-being, and deepens the connection between mind, body and spirit in both the giver and receiver. Combining Thai massage with your own meditation makes this system complete, balanced and deeply therapeutic.

company.business_diffrences: The value of our service for the price is unbeatable.
company.learning_trade: All of our massage therapists are highly experienced.
company.why_love: We love offering a relaxing experience for all of our clients.
company.name: Spaahbulous And More
company.description: At Spaahbulous & More, we offer you a soothing massage that will start at your feet and then include your back, neck, shoulders and arms. Our therapeutic massage techniques will help blood circulation, improve your immune system, heal internal ailments, release stress, and promote more restful sleep. Our foot massage is based on traditional Chinese foot massage. We also offer serivces like herbal foot soak, extensive upper body massage, reflexology, acupressure and deep tissue. According to the principles of reflexology, different parts of the foot correspond in actions with different parts of the body. A toe massage can assuage sinus pain while applying pressure on the arch soothes a tummy ache. Nearly every person can benefit from a good foot massage. Our traditional foot spa and ancient Chinese style foot massage can reduce or eliminate pain. Your feet support you all day: you should take care of them and give them a rest. Besides, you need to be unstressed. Our foot massage will give you an awesome and relaxing experience! Come join us in our relaxing and serene spa where we will make all your worries disappear.

company.business_diffrences: Our communication with the client during the massage to minimize discomfort and provide the maximum benefit to our clients.
company.why_love: I love to provide health and wellness through massage therapy. I believe it allows us to reach a large and diverse segment of our society, which includes cancer patients, seniors, athletes, and those who suffer from repetitive injuries from working on computers. It is also a great way to relax and relieve some stress.
company.name: Best Stress Solutions
company.description: Best Stress Solutions: Our mission is to provide the best health and wellness possible through Massage Therapy and health information.

company.business_diffrences: Our business is stylish and modern. All of our services are proudly provided by licensed Professional staff.
company.why_love: We love to provide relaxing, tension free, and healthier alternatives for our customers.
company.name: Tulip Thai Massage
company.description:
Tulip Thai massage offers traditional Thai, Swedish, Deep Tissue, Combination, and Foot massages by friendly, experienced Thai practitioners to ensure the most authentic massage. 
Thai Massage is our specialty. If you would like to know more about Thai massage, see the description and photos on our website. Some worry that Thai massage is painful, but we make sure to avoid that by tailoring each massage to every individual's needs. If you are looking for a great massage, we offer a slow,very relaxing body massage. Our room is set up to provide the most comfortable environment with a wide table, warm massage oil, and relaxing music.

Benefits of Thai Massage
- Relaxatioon of Mind & Body
- Release of Emotional Distress
- Improve Physical Performance
- Increase Flexibility and Postural Alignment
- Stimulate Blood Circulation
- Eliminate Muscle Pain & Spasms
- Relieve Fatigue, Swollen Limbs, Painful Joints & Headaches

name: Colorpuncture & Reflexology
street_address: 4118 Sea View Lane, Los Angeles, Ca 90065

company.business_diffrences: "I'm not your average spa service. I help people feel better and do better using colorpuncture and reflexology, color and massage therapy -- but with a twist! I have studied hypnotherapy, aromatherapy (colorenergy), and color therapy (Colorpuncture) extensively and incorporate those modalities into the amazing services I offer, creating a holistic experience for body, mind, and spirit. That's why I call it meta-physical therapy. Meaning beyond the body. As a skilled and experienced practitioner, I listen a lot and coach gently. In another sense I listen to your body through my hands and intuition, performing colorpuncture and reflexology treatments. I may begin with reflexology, but I offer so much more." ~ xoML
company.learning_trade: "I am certified by the Institute of Esogetic Colorpuncture & Energy Emission Analysis, USA as a Certified Colorpuncture Practitioner; by the American Academy of Reflexology as a Certified Integrated Reflexology Practitioner; my hypnotherapy certification is from Hypnosis Motivation Institute; and I received my ministerial ordination and certification in Quantum Energetic Healing by The Messengers of Light founder, Fatima Abate of Brazil."
company.why_love: "It's all about service to others for me. If not for service, then why? It is so much fun doing the work I do. I love seeing the transformation of an individual from stress and tension to relaxation and calm. It's as if a light goes on inside. Their eyes look different, their body and posture are more relaxed, and they become more of who they are: happy in the moment. It's beautiful!"
company.name: Colorpuncture & Reflexology
company.description:
COLORPUNCTURE & REFLEXOLOGY are complementary therapies that support profound relaxation. Deep relaxation encourages deep self-healing. Deep relaxed healing helps everything on all levels of body, mind, and spirit. During a session as the person relaxes more deeply, muscle and skeletal tensions are eased, endorphins are released into the bloodstream, stress melts away promoting feelings of rejuvanation and well-being.

"My complementary therapy tools - COLORPUNCTURE and REFLEXOLOGY - when combined with hypnotherapy and life coaching, helps to bring balance back to your body, mind, and being so you can clear away the stress blocks and focus on priorities and goals. No effort is wasted, regardless of how small. Everything will improve if you make an effort today."

Margaret Lambert, C.C.P., C.Rflx. is a complementary therapy specialist certified in the following practices: colorpuncture, integrated reflexology, hypnotherapy, and quantum energetic healing. But her primary tools are light, color, and you. Margaret has worked along side doctors and therapists in the complementary therapy profession for over 18 years using a unique combination of esoteric and energetic healing techniques that helps clients to engage in their own healing, create happiness, and embrace a balanced healthy lifestyle.

Ms. Leo specializes in problem skin and has worked with client's who suffer from immune and inviornmental allergies, extreme sensitivity to products. Ms. Leo has an extensive knowledge of herbs and botanicals. All products used in her practice are of the highest integrity with no animal testing.

In private practice for fifteen years, I have also worked in conjunction with chiropractors, acupuncturists, and other teachers and healers. I currently teach at Mueller College.
company.why_love: I want to make a difference. I love to help people heal, and to get immediate, tangible results. I get to be the good guy!
company.name: Cronan Massage And Bodywork
company.description:
Founded in 2000, Cronan Massage and Bodywork serves Los Angeles and San Diego.
My mission is to foster balance, provide relief from pain and stress, and enable greater health for as many people as possible.
I offer therapeutic massage and bodywork that is custom tailored to each client.
My modalities include deep tissue, Swedish, reiki, craniosacral therapy, trigger point therapy, myofascial release, cupping, and chair massage. I also add acupressure and reflexology to my sessions.

company.business_diffrences: Matthew has been an energy worker for life. Studying vibrational remedies & exploring the potentials of holistic health. He incorporates a "laying of hands" type spiritual healing to all massage modalities, this has been known to invoke a consolidation process that induces physical healing. Matthew has complemented his education with spirit and compassion. Skills include: Swedish, deep tissue, myotherapy, reflexology, healing touch, lymphatic drainage and cranial sacral.
company.learning_trade: I went to Linclon Institute of Healing Arts in Orange, CA
company.why_love: It's all about service. My skills and healing gifts can be utilized to help others get to a level of relaxation. I love shifting perspectives.
company.name: Massage Alchemy
company.description:
Hey, guys.  I'm Matthew...a down to earth, sincere and compassionate dude who holds space for the physical transformation of stress, tension, pain, and malaise.  I've come to realize the treasure a massage can truly become holding healing, neutral space, and a sacred time honored earth ritual. I use skill and intention to co-create a memorable experience. 

It can be as simple and basic as a swedish massage, to therapeutic trigger points, to the full pressure of deep tissue - equalizing and balancing your inner and outer being.

During our session we will work together to ease your mind, relax your muscles, raise your vibration, re-discover self acceptance, ignite your senses, be with oneness, and find your peace.

Let's work together to bring you a shift.

company.learning_trade:
I have been a chiropractor since 1996. Before attending chiropractic school, I went to Loyola Stritch School of Medicine. I stayed in medical school, before switching to a chiropractic school in Los Angeles. 

In medical school, I took anatomy, histology, pathology, neuroanatomy, physiology and psychiatry classes. When I went to Cleveland Chiropractic College, I learned all the subjects more deeply and throughly. Furthermore, I learned diagnostics, radiology and nutrition to compliment my chiropractic studies.
company.why_love: I love what I do because I can serve my patients and help them get back on the path to proper health.
company.name: Robert Gabai, DC
company.description:
Robert Gabai's DC, Los Angeles office provides only the highest quality of service. We provide musculoskeletal care in a non invasive and drug free way. We believe Chiropractic treatments are based on the premise that body can heal itself. 

We provide more than just chiropractic treatments. We will cover proper dieting, nutritional consulting, and stress management to compliment your chiropractic treatments. We also provide referrals to other health care professionals as needed.

company.business_diffrences: Thomas is systematic in his approach, creating a unique framework for every session by practicing in a variety of techniques, and mixing modalities to suit the individual needs of each client.
company.learning_trade: Thomas Silcott has been practicing massage for 17 years. In 1999, Thomas moved to Los Angeles and began full time study in massage at California Healing Arts College.  After receiving his license, he continued his studies in massage taking masters classes at Santa Monica School of Massage, Holistic Health Institute and A to Z Health.
company.why_love: He believes that the laying on of hands is a true blessing, but real healing comes from the combination of a practitioner with healing hands and a client who is ready for healing who will truly receive.
company.name: Tom Silcott, LMT
company.description: Thomas began studying massage therapy during his last year in college.  For the next three years he practiced on his classmates in graduate school in New York City.  In 1996, Thomas received his MFA and continued practicing massage in between theater and film productions. Thomas practices privately in the Los Angeles area, and has worked with Skin Spa in Encino, Spoiled - a day spa in Studio City, and the Massage Place in Sherman Oaks.  He has also practiced massage at two Tae Kwon Do championship tournaments, the Los Angeles marathon, the visiting Harlem repertory dance company, and for CBS and paramount studios.

company.business_diffrences: We treat our customers with care and respect. We understand that every person is different and we cater our services to match your needs.
company.why_love: We love to enhance the beauty that everyone posses. We feel great when someone loves the way they look and feel after leaving the Celebrity Look Laser Center. Our goal is to beautify everyone.

company.learning_trade:
In addition to her private practice, Dr. Monroe has been a faculty member at Dongguk University, as well as at her alma mater, Samra University of Oriental Medicine. She began her academic pursuits by completing a Pre-Med curriculum at Loyola University Chicago where she graduated Magna Cum Laude from the University Honors Program with a B.S in Psychology. After graduating, she worked as a Research Technologist at the University of Chicago in the Departments of Drug Abuse Research and Anesthesiology/Critical Care, as well as conducting collaborative research with the Departments of Cardiology and Cardiac Surgery.

Dr. Monroe attended Pilates Teacher Training with Romana Kryzanowska from NYC and studied with Rael Isacowitz and Moira Stott as well. She completed a one-year Kundalini Yoga Teacher Training with Gurmukh Kaur Khalsa, and in doing so, traveled to India with Gurmukh and Yogi Bhajan. Melissa also completed Hatha Yoga Teacher Training with the wonderful Erich Schiffmann and has attended many workshops with other great teachers such as Rodney Yee, David Life and Sharon Gannon. She is also a certified Qigong Instructor, having completed Level One training with Jeff Primack of the Supreme Science Qigong Center.

A Registered Yoga Teacher (RYT) with Yoga Alliance, Melissa formed her own business in 1996 and taught while putting herself through Samra University, where she graduated with a 4.0 GPA and earned an Award for Academic Excellence. Among other groups and individuals, she teaches Pilates and yoga to the staff of Children's Hospital (LA) and specializes in neuromuscular re-education and rehabilitation. In addition to the training Dr. Monroe received at Samra, she has completed several post-graduate training programs, including programs for the treatment of acute and chronic pain such as The Balance Method by Dr. Richard Tan, which utilizes points away from the injured area to help reduce inflammation and encourage muscle relaxation via distal reflex connections. She completed a one-year advanced Acupuncture Orthopedics course with Don Lee, L.Ac, making her AOA Board Certified in Acupuncture Orthopedics. She has also studied advanced herbal prescription construction and has completed several training programs in the treatment of women’s health issues, including fertility and reproductive health.

Dr. Monroe was also active in promoting her profession by serving on the American Association of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine’s Student Organization Council as a Regional Director as well as Co-Chair of the Media and Publication Committee. In serving so, she has written several articles for the Association’s professional online journal. Dr. Monroe earned a Ph.D in Oriental Medicine in June 2009. Her dissertation explored “The Treatment of Female Infertility due to Disorders of the Hypothalamic-Pituitary-Ovarian Axis,” which is one of her specialties along with treatment of pain syndromes, neuromuscular re-education and rehabilitation, pediatrics, and stress-related illness, such as digestive problems, depression, anxiety and insomnia. Dr. Monroe’s diverse educational background ensures that every patient receives the highly individualized treatment that is necessary for optimal health and she firmly believes that empowerment and education of the patient towards prevention and self-care is of the foremost importance in the healing process.
company.name: Eastside Family Acupuncture
company.description:
Melissa M Monroe, Ph.D, L.Ac is the owner and founder of Eastside Family Acupuncture and is licensed by the State of California, as well as being nationally certified by the National Certification Commission for Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine. 

After several unsuccessful operations on a knee injury, Dr. Monroe found amazing rehabilitative results from yoga, Pilates and acupuncture and began to study all of the modalities intensively. As she healed herself, many people came to her for advice on healing their injuries, and so began her teaching career.
